title: LGBTQ groups sue Florida over the so-called 'Don't Say Gay' law - NPR
content:
1. LGBTQ groups sue Florida over the so-called 'Don't Say Gay' law  NPR
  2. Martin County School District responds to DeSantis criticism of LGBTQ support plan  WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
  3. Not just Florida: States weigh bills banning gender ID and sexual orientation instruction  Fox News
  4. DeSantis says ‘Don’t say gay’ is about parental rights. Really? Then why is it so vague? | Editorial  Miami Herald
  5. We already don't say gay, so what's the real problem? | Column  Tampa Bay Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The challenge against Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis aims to block a new law that forbids classroom instruction on sexual orientation and gender identity in kindergarten through third grade.
